items.summary: Debug and fix the Add Employee button rendering issue in frontend/src/pages/EmployeeDirectory.tsx by adding console logging to verify user profile data, role checks, and button conditional rendering logic
Verify that useCallerUserProfile hook in frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts is correctly fetching the user profile and returning valid role data after authentication

Add fallback rendering for the Add Employee button in EmployeeDirectory.tsx that displays the button with full opacity and prominent styling regardless of role checks, with a visible label indicating it's in debug mode

Ensure the Add Employee button in EmployeeDirectory.tsx is placed outside any conditional rendering blocks that might be preventing its display, positioning it as a direct child of the main page container
